messages.message:
<!subteam^S01DXHX6FPT> I ran few flows from my account ('Shubhu') on ib.com (http://ib.com) and was trying to refer them back in the metrics app (I have access to that). But while trying to find relevant filter values in 'repo' , 'flow path' , 'user' , etc I couldn't find the actual value... for example, my repo name is 'metrics' where I ran all the flows but in the metrics app, I can't find any such repo in the repo dropdown.. similarly for 'flow path', I couldn't find the flow path on which I ran the flows.. pasting an example flow path here: https://instabase.com/apps/flow/edit/Shubhu/metrics/fs/Instabase%20Drive/ca_docs%20(1)/ca-docs.ibflow

Can someone help with this? I need to present something to SC on how the metrics numbers are calculated and so it is critical to get this working..

That’s weird, they should be in there because I’m seeing flows run by other folks show up. Maybe the UI isn’t showing enough results (not paging properly) and you haven’t generated enough data. Can you try calling the metrics API to see if you get more results there?
sure. will try with the APIs Heymian.
